metadata.name: OasisPiggy
metadata.description:
此卡用以纪念 WePiggy 跨链部署计划的第九步：登陆 Oasis Emerald。突入 DeFi 绿洲之上，成为头号玩家。持有此卡可获得由 WePiggy 加持的“无限宝石，纵横绿洲”状态。This card is issued to commemorate the 9th step of WePiggy's cross-chain deployment plan: Oasis Emerald. Dive into the DeFi oasis and become the Player One. Holder of this NFT will be blessed by WePiggy with the buff of "Holding Infinity Stone, Standing on the Top of Oasis World".
总量(Amount)：98 
品级(Level)：史诗(Epic)
